alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. Johns, northeastern Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Picolata, or 7 miles east of Green Cove Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Green Cove Springs, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Vilano Beach, Picolata, Bostwick, Federal Point, South Ponte Vedra and Crescent Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns
